members.name: Sara Stokes
members.description: The singer in the group with a voice that is reminiscent to Tina Turner. Her relationship with Freddy P though has been a source of a lot of drama within the band.

members.name: Dylan Dilinjah
members.description: 5 best rappers alive -- Dylan, Dylan, Dylan, Dylan and Dylan.  Rumor has it, he spits hot fire.

members.name: Kevin Barnes
members.description: The bad boy of the group, Chopper brings his NOLO rap style to the scene.  His attitute may stop him from making it to the top though.

members.name: Lynese Wiley
members.description: The chain-smoking Brooklynite is the groupâ€™s only female rapper and represented as such.  Her rhymes are almost as tigth as her weave.

members.name: Lloyd Mathis
members.description: Philly rapper E. Ness is known as the leader of the group, with a hot flow and a hotter temper.

members.name: Fredrick Watson
members.description: Freddy P. ain't about that squad life.  The Miami rapper can handle rhymes with the best of them, but can also be a lot to handle.
